sourcesContent:
Page 5

Button Clicks

  • Button ID: {{ click.buttonId }} - Click Count: {{ click.count }}

{{ message }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ButtonClickService } from '../../services/button-click.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-page5', templateUrl: './page5.component.html', styleUrls: ['./page5.component.css'] }) export class Page5Component implements OnInit { buttonClicks: any[] = []; message: string = ''; constructor(private buttonClickService: ButtonClickService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} fetchButtonClicks(): void { const userId = 'yourUserId'; // Kullanıcı ID'sini buradan al veya kullanıcıdan al this.buttonClickService.getButtonClicks(userId).subscribe( (response: any) => { this.buttonClicks = response; this.message = ''; }, (error: any) => { this.message = 'Error fetching button clicks'; console.error(error); } ); } logout() { // Oturum kapatma işlemleri burada yapılır. console.log('User logged out'); this.router.navigate(['/login']); } }
